log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"file_name":"index.html","content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head><title>Sunset Mountains</title></head>
<body>
<svg width="800" height="600" viewBox="0 0 800 600">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="gradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFD700"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#FFA07A"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#87CEEB"/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#gradient)"/>
  <!-- Mountains -->
  <path d="M 50 400 Q 200 250 350 400 T 650 400" fill="#2F4F4F" stroke="#000" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M 200 350 Q 400 200 600 350 T 800 450" fill="#2F4F4F" stroke="#000" stroke-width="2" />
  <!-- Sun -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="100" r="50" fill="yellow" />
</svg>
</body>
</html>"}
